description:
In the process of trying to liberate Ki Shou, Hakuyuko gets persecuted for attacking Dakki. Taikoubou returns to Mount Kunlun to talk to Genshitenson about the real purpose of Project Houshin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chi Chan le seigneur de l’Ouest s’enfuit
Ki Chou, Lord of the West, Escapes from Chouka
Seihakukou Kishou Chouka o Dasshutsu Su
西伯侯姫昌朝歌を脱出す
